title: Color speaks
creator_credit: Agoshdang Karyani and Hungarian Documentary Film Studios
brief_description: The beauties of the landscape, its colorful plant life and the insects and animals which inhabit it: laws of nature and the part color plays in them. Good close up and time lapse photography of insects, plants, birds and animals.
